"Create a community-driven healthcare system where individuals take responsibility for their own health and well-being."
"Develop a system of natural remedies and alternative therapies that can be used in place of traditional medicine."
"Implement a system of preventative healthcare that focuses on promoting healthy habits and behaviors."
"Develop a system of emergency response that relies on community members and volunteers."
"Create a network of local pharmacies and drugstores that can provide essential medications and supplies."
